name: Mother&Mother
description:
Everyone was a child, but not everyone was a child with a difficult family, especially with drinking parents, someone is ready to die for someone else's life, but try to live for them.

If you are noticed, you can run into your room, and the mother will fall behind you, but no more than 3 times.

press E to take the lighter

press F to light the lighter (mother will leave you for a while)

twitter.com/G0AT1C
